attributes.action: making period products free of charge
attributes.additional_details: birth control is expensive when needed to be payed for and the waiting list is very long for something that can help women out.
attributes.background: making every period product free of charge. sometimes woman find it difficult to pay for monthly period products, and homeless women and vulnerable woman find it very difficult to pay for them so they end up getting caught stealing for a necessity that happens every month.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund free period pads
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733282
